targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "javascript.0.Wetterstation.Info.Regenmenge_VorJahr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "javascript.0.Wetterstation._Kommunikationsfehler" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT last("value") FROM "javascript.0.Wetterstation._Kommunikationsfehler" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "javascript.0.Wetterstation.Aussentemperatur" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") AS "°C" FROM "javascript.0.Wetterstation.Druck_relativ" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
